name: Purple Afghani
description: A strong plant that is easy to grow. This Afghani is a mostly Indica inbred to produce thick and heavy buds. This variety has dark green leaves and calyxes that turn purple at flowering. Medium-high leaf to flower ratio with a subtle aroma and a very good high.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Sleepy, Happy, Euphoric, Uplifted, Stress, Pain, Insomnia, Depression, Headaches, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Anxious, Dizzy, Headache
